Articles.Content:
Never had a problem with the game until now.  Every 10-15 minutes ill get a 'ksp.exe' has stopped working and I have to restart it.  It wont generate a crash log in the game folder as far as I can tell.  The mods I use are Chatterer, Crowd sourced science, Firespitter (came with KSO), RasterPropMonitor, Hyperedit, Klockhead Martin Gimbal (have no idea what it is, came with kso) KSO, Mechjeb2 and SmokeScreen (also came with KSO).  Thanks in asvance

Edited May 24, 2016 by Ateball
are you playing in the 32 bit version? Try using the 64 bit version, which should be ksp_64.exe

You probably are experiencing the "bug 8241" which is crashes in the VAB or upon decoupling without any crash logs generated.

Please proivide more information about your issue, see the two following thread to see where you can find it:

Once you posted the required information, if the crashes your are experiencing are indeed the 8241, please try to reproduce it with as few mods as you can and post all information you can on this thread:
